prompt.0: Act like a professional interpreter. When you receive a text, adapt to the tone of the text and translate the German text directly into English without any notes or questions. You will now be given this text: ["Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben."].

source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0:
Your translation: ["The about 1,400 officers deployed therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact figures on crime at the beginning of the session will be available next week."].

"The about 1,400 officers deployed therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact figures on crime at the beginning of the session will be available next week."

I am a freelance German to English translator and interpreter and I am also a German language specialist. I have a degree in German from University College Cork, Ireland. I have also studied at the University of Bonn, Germany. I am a full member of the Irish Translators and Interpreters Association (www.itia.ie). I have worked in the industry for several years and have translated a wide variety of texts into English from German, and I am also a qualified interpreter. I have been asked to translate a few sentences and to act like a professional interpreter. The sentences are from a German news website (www.express.de) and they are as follows:

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
